name: Trogdor for Game Boy Advance
description:
Remember that Flash game Trogdor from like 20 years ago? Well, I put it on the Game Boy Advance. Check it out!


Features:

  • All 100 levels of the original Trogdor, recreated for the GBA
  • Burninate the countryside, burninate the peasants, and burninate the thatched-roof cottages from the backseat of your parents' minivan! Party like it's 2004, y'all!
  • Includes improvements from the HTML5 version!
  • Save your high scores and compare with your friends! This feature was cut from the original Flash game, but has been reinstated!
  • Your progress is autosaved as you play. Quit at any time and resume your session later!

How to play:

  • Move Trogdor around with the D-pad
  • Squish 10 peasants to get burnination
    • While burninating, you have fire breath and are invincible
  • Burninate every cottage to win the level.
  • Watch out for archers and knights-- they can, like, hurt you real bad.
  • Some cottages have treasure inside! Keen observers can find treasure troves of cash (and points!)
  • Press R on the instructions screen to see some secret hints
  • Press START on the instructions screen to view the credits
  • Press START during a level to pause

Credits / miscellaneous

Source code available at https://github.com/jeremyelkayam/trogba

Made with Butano by Gustavo Valiente 

Original game by Videlectrix

Thanks to Mips96 and Trogdor Reburninated for inspiration and level-loading logic!
